title: Bitcoin Q1 2026 Analysis
description: Deep dive into BTC fundamentals and price outlook
content:
# Bitcoin Q1 2026 Analysis

## Executive Summary
Bitcoin shows strong bullish momentum entering Q1 2026 with institutional adoption accelerating.

## Key Metrics
- Current Price: $87,500
- 30-day Average Volume: $45B
- Market Dominance: 52.3%

## Technical Analysis
The daily chart shows a clear ascending triangle pattern with support at $82k and resistance at $88k. A breakout above $88k could trigger a move to $95k.

## On-Chain Metrics
- Active Addresses: 1.2M (â†‘15% MoM)
- Exchange Outflows: 45k BTC (bullish)
- Long-term Holder Supply: 68% (ATH)

## Outlook
Target: $95k-$105k by end of Q1 2026
Support: $75k
Risk: Regulatory uncertainty in US markets

*Last Updated: Feb 7, 2026*

title: Ethereum DeFi Trends 2026
description: Analysis of emerging DeFi protocols and ETH price impact
content:
# Ethereum DeFi Trends 2026

## Overview
Ethereum's DeFi ecosystem continues to evolve with Layer 2 solutions driving adoption.

## Key Developments
1. **Layer 2 Dominance**: 70% of DeFi volume now on L2s
2. **Real-World Assets**: $15B in tokenized assets
3. **AI Integration**: Smart contract automation via AI agents

## ETH Price Outlook
Current: $4,200
Target: $5,500-$6,000

## Investment Thesis
- Deflationary supply dynamics (EIP-1559)
- Growing institutional custody solutions
- ETF approval momentum

*Last Updated: Feb 7, 2026*

title: Top AI Company Prediction

content:
# AI Ranking Prediction

Execute this via `/api/predict/ai` to get the latest analysis.
